1073 Biden-Appointed Judge Poised to Order Mass Release of Illegal Aliens Detained in ICE’s “Operation Blitz” — Thousands Could Be Dumped Back onto Chicago Streets (www.thegatewaypundit.com) posted 22 hours ago by thegatewaybandit 167 comments award share report block Biden-Appointed Judge Poised to Order Mass Release of Illegal Aliens Detained in ICE’s “Operation Blitz” — Thousands Could Be Du... In yet another blow to immigration enforcement, a federal judge in Illinois is reportedly preparing to order the mass release of thousands of illegal aliens detained during ICE’s “Operation Blitz,” a nationwide crackdown on criminal and repeat im... www.thegatewaypundit.com

They don't live at the courthouse.  They go out for drinks and dinner just like everyone else.  Just taking care of that problem would transform society. Judges that remain untouched would signal what kind of judge the people actually want and they would be forced to fall in line.  If ever there were a first step in this operation it would be the activist judges.
